16 ounces pasta,1 cup frozen peas,12 spears asparagus,2 green onions,1/2 cup feta,fresh herbs,1 cup baby spinach,1 cup fresh basil,1 chives,1 small shallot,1/2 teaspoon granulated garlic,1/4 cup raw cashews,1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese,2 tablespoons nutritional yeast,2 lemons,2 tablespoons rice vinegar,1/2 cup olive oil,salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste,,
